name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: God of War Kratos: A Titan in Battle Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Witness Kratos in battle, the God of War, with dynamic visuals, shortcuts, and a sleek design in this live wallpaper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Epic Action: Capture Kratos in the midst of a fierce battle, embodying raw strength and power.
Dynamic Visuals: High-resolution animations bring the God of War to life.
Sleek Design: Minimalistic interface for a refined browsing experience.
Shortcut Integration: Quick access to your favorite sites with a single click.
Time & Date Display: Stay updated with a conveniently placed clock.
Interactive Search: Browse efficiently with a responsive search bar.
More Extension: Boost productivity with enhanced features and tools.
